document.full_text: mclaren's lewis hamilton and nascar's double title winner tony stewart will swap cars for the day at the watkins glen circuit in upstate new york on june 14, both sides announced friday.
document.title: hamilton and stewart in f1/nascar car swap
lines_and_colors: mclaren's lewis hamilton and nascar's double title winner tony stewart will swap cars for the day at the watkins glen circuit in upstate new york on june 14, both sides announced friday.
